es.ucm.fdi.tp.demo

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ucm.fdi.tp.demo.Main

  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    Demo main, used to test game functionality. You can use it as an inspiration, but we expect you to build your own main-class.
